amendment.description: Amendment provides the VA with the authority to share a patient's electronic health record with VA community-based providers, while maintaining HIPPA protections.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 114-742 to provide the VA with the authority to share a patient's electronic health record with VA community-based providers, while maintaining HIPPA protections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Rourke amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. O'Rourke.
